message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 6-4-1, translated into en
data: Target 6.4: By 2030, significantly increase water use efficiency in all areas, ensure a sustainable supply of clean water to address water scarcity, and significantly reduce the number of people suffering from scarcity. country. Ensure that water extraction does not exceed the extraction limit for rivers, and does not exceed exploitable reserves for aquifers (global 6.4 target)
